channel.title: 508 Server and Client Help Need
channel.description:
Please Help Me! This is my first time trying a 508 a server to run but i played 525 clients. please help me as quick as you can. thank you. this is what it says. When I Opened 508 hd client.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: loader Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: loader at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: loader. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Edit Run server .bat
@echo off cd ../bin color 0a Title DavidScape 508 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" DavidScape/Server 43594 pause
When i Open davidscape 508 v4 source
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: DavidScape/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: DavidScape.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: DavidScape/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
